As @chapulina suggested, the element can be reused. It requires an URL and shows it's status. Should including it into the SRC Kiosk be part of [CLOUD-73](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-73), or as a separated task?

The status of the machines should be checked inside the rounds and using the `machine_ip`? This status should be place below the Machine, or the Practice boxes?

What do you think @preyna, @iche033, @andres_fortier ?
